)

Inherited from ozpIwc.transport.participant.Base: src\js\bus\transport\listener\listener.js:88

Finds the participant associated with the given window. Unfortunately, this is an o(n) algorithm, since there doesn't seem to be any way to hash, order, or any other way to compare windows other than equality.
